channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Verizon Promo Codes | December 2024
item.description: Unlock savings on phones, tablets, internet, and more with the best Verizon discounts.

item.title: Orakl Oncology combines data and biology to bring new drugs to cancer patients

item.title: Hulu Promo Codes and Discounts: 90% Off for Select Users
item.description: Students can get a Hulu plan for $1.99 per month. Get more details on this and other great deals below.

item.title: 20% Off Brooks Promo Code & Deals for December 2024

item.title: A New VR Game Puts You in the Middle of Real English Premier League Plays
item.description: The new game from Rezzil called Premier League Player uses spatial data captured in real soccer games to recreate critical plays in virtual reality.

item.title: US agency proposes new rule blocking data brokers from selling Americans’ sensitive personal data
item.description: The U.S. consumer protection agency said it's closing the loophole to block the "widespread evasion" of federal law by data brokers. © 2024 TechCrunch...

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Codes: 15% Off Major Appliances
item.description: Get 15% off a selection of KitchenAid major appliances, such as refrigerators, oven ranges, dishwashers, cooktops, and more.
